text: What are you waiting for? Call it!

On the bench-- he was moved there after he collapsed in front of the net.

Hockey, rough game.
Yeah, it's murder.
Two minutes for elbowing.
Four minutes for high sticking.
Ten minutes, unsportsmanlike conduct.
Boys will be boys.

You just don't like sports.

So, we'll start at the opposite goal work our way across the blue line to center ice.
Sure.

Then Mr. Rivers was still breathing?

You are...?

Which means? He gave me a high stick to the mouth.

An eye for an eye, you know?
That why your guy ended up dead?
What can I tell you, lady?
It all happened so fast, you know?
Usually does.

A rippling stream, a fire in a fireplace and a Zamboni going round and round.
Charlie Brown.

We all do.

Hey.

by...
nine feet.

100 cubic feet.

the whole tooth...
and nothing but the tooth.

Lockwood, Homicide.

without any of the paraphernalia.

She came through me. Already cleared her.

grabbed the stuff took their glass.

What happened to him? Miss...

Hairline fracture of the ulna bruised kidney ten stitches off the orbital bone fractured nasal bone, all recent.

He should have worn a cage.

What is it about organized sports?
Well, organized sports is the paradigmatic model of a just society.
Everyone knows the same language everyone knows the rules.
And there's a specific punishment handed out the moment someone tries to cheat.
Instant morality.
So, uh, what did this guy do in real life?
Stockbroker.
Competition junky.
Aren't we all?
Not me, not anymore.
No?

We get our meat from the grocery store instead of with a club or a knife.
We have to work off our, uh, testosterone somehow.
Foibles of youth.
Yeah.

Not sure.
This cut nicked his carotid.

could have killed him.

Always stirring the pot.

I also lead the team in assists.

You're a real teammate.

hated him.

Nice bike.

Give me some credit.

So, this is what being a stockbroker buys you.
Hmm, well.

Well, it's a cave with hardwood floors.
It's clean.

connection to anybody.
I don't know about that.

Well, uh, ballparking it, I'd say...
four women to every one piece of furniture he owns including the TV.
So...
I guess our guy is about three things-- pucks, bucks, and...
chicks.

Well, we know how he lived.
Any blood?
Take your pick.

Well, speaking on a meta-level...
Isn't it obvious?

Chess is not a sport, Greg.

and I don't think the singer, Lillie met him before last night, so she may be in the clear.

like you're going to take Dumpster duty alone.

Warrick.

No. All the guys had money with him.

still, why lie about it?

your friend Jane is pregnant.

Doing it?

I wasn't family.

Took off.

Tommy... husband material.

Right here.

Didn't have access to quinine let alone know it would kill him.
So who did know?
Terry was a roughneck.

Which in hockey is a sacrilege.
Someone besides Terry had to know.
Somebody did.

Anyone with access to Terry's medical records knew how to kill him.

I'm an orthopedist. None.
Not according to the pharmacy in your medical building.

I did him a favor. That's it.

I am the on-site doctor for this facility.
Nothing more and nothing less.

Italy.

But Jane's had a couple of boyfriends since that trip, right?

I need you.

We're friends.
I don't want the whole world to know that I've been with Terry.
Please?
Okay, okay. I'll stay with Terry.
